nodes.documentation: @title Guardians wallet contract interface
nodes.name: IGuardiansWallet

nodes.documentation:
@dev Assigns rewards to the Guardians balances.
 Assumes approve of the funds transfer prior to the call
nodes.name: assignRewardsToGuardians

nodes.documentation:
@dev Distributes msg.sender's orbs token rewards to a list of addresses, by transferring directly into the staking contract.
 Total delegators reward (addresses other than the Guardians) must be less than maxDelegatorsStakingRewardsPercentMille of total amount.
nodes.name: distributeStakingRewards

nodes.documentation: @return Returns the currently unclaimed orbs token reward balance of the given address.
nodes.name: getStakingRewardBalance

nodes.documentation:
@dev Transfer all of msg.sender's outstanding balance to the Guardian account.
 may be called with either the Guardian address or node address.
nodes.name: withdrawFees

nodes.documentation: @return Returns the currently unclaimed orbs token reward balance of the given address.
nodes.name: getFeeBalance

nodes.documentation:
@dev Transfer all of msg.sender's outstanding balance to the Guardian account.
 may be called with either the Guardian address or node address.
nodes.name: withdrawBootstrapFunds

nodes.documentation: @return Returns the currently unclaimed bootstrap balance of the given address.
nodes.name: getBootstrapBalance

nodes.documentation:
@dev the maximum percent that may be distributed to delegators, provided in milli-percent.
 For example: 66667 indicates that up to 2/3 of the rewards may be distributed to the dlegators and a 1/3 is distributed to the Guardian.
nodes.name: setMaxDelegatorsStakingRewards

nodes.documentation: @dev an emergency withdrawal, enables withdrawal of all funds to an escrow account. To be use in emergencies only.
nodes.name: emergencyWithdraw

nodes.name: IGuardiansWallet

assignRewardsToGuardians(address[],uint2.details: Assigns rewards to the Guardians balances. Assumes approve of the funds transfer prior to the call

distributeStakingRewards(uint256,uint256.details: Distributes msg.sender's orbs token rewards to a list of addresses, by transferring directly into the staking contract. Total delegators reward (addresses other than the Guardians) must be less than maxDelegatorsStakingRewardsPercentMille of total amount.

emergencyWithdraw().details: an emergency withdrawal, enables withdrawal of all funds to an escrow account. To be use in emergencies only.

getBootstrapBalance(address).return: Returns the currently unclaimed bootstrap balance of the given address.

getFeeBalance(address).return: Returns the currently unclaimed orbs token reward balance of the given address.

getStakingRewardBalance(address).return: Returns the currently unclaimed orbs token reward balance of the given address.

setMaxDelegatorsStakingRewards(uint32).details: the maximum percent that may be distributed to delegators, provided in milli-percent. For example: 66667 indicates that up to 2/3 of the rewards may be distributed to the dlegators and a 1/3 is distributed to the Guardian.

withdrawBootstrapFunds().details: Transfer all of msg.sender's outstanding balance to the Guardian account. may be called with either the Guardian address or node address.

withdrawFees().details: Transfer all of msg.sender's outstanding balance to the Guardian account. may be called with either the Guardian address or node address.
